channel.title: A buzzer game script? good idea or bad? should i try?
channel.description: it seems like it wouldnt be to hard, just REALLY tedious...... lol i need a script to script for me!!!!!! ;D anyway, if you think about it, you could have it set to where the mouse mouse smoothly following bitmaps, it would be a HUGE script, thats just the bitmap codes..... but anyway, think anyone would want it? i'm starting on it right now, it'll take a long time, perhaps an hour per level, but i have been bored lately, so ii'm ready for a challenge :D i have to make a bitmap for every piece of the cord for each level, so if anybody is up to helping me code a few levels, i'd be happy :D i figured using coords would work too, but they seem easily detectable because it would just buzz straight through it..... eh, i'll try coding one level of each, see which is better :P that's my idea, comments appreciated! :D

Actually, KyleGut just said that it was the wrong section.

item.dc:creator: @knuzcu knuzcu
item.description:
@knuzcu wrote:

yeah, i’m still new to neopets, but i’ve heard that they had color changing too…
so bitmaps would be a bad idea?
i guess i’ll try to do it with coordinates then… a bit more boring, but probably more bugfree

item.title: A buzzer game script? good idea or bad? should i try?
item.dc:creator: @knuzcu knuzcu
item.description:
@knuzcu wrote:

it seems like it wouldnt be to hard, just REALLY tedious… lol i need a script to script for me!!! ;D
anyway, if you think about it, you could have it set to where the mouse mouse smoothly following bitmaps, it would be a HUGE script, thats just the bitmap codes… but anyway, think anyone would want it? i’m starting on it right now, it’ll take a long time, perhaps an hour per level, but i have been bored lately, so ii’m ready for a challenge i have to make a bitmap for every piece of the cord for each level, so if anybody is up to helping me code a few levels, i’d be happy
i figured using coords would work too, but they seem easily detectable because it would just buzz straight through it… eh, i’ll try coding one level of each, see which is better
that’s my idea, comments appreciated!

Read full topic
